About the Company: National Fittings Ltd as incorporated as a public limited company on 21 Apr.`93 to set up a plant at Kaniyur, Tamilnadu. Phase-I of the project commenced production in Jan.`95 to manufacture stainless steel pipe fittings with an installed capacity of 2.4 lac pieces. While implementing phase I, the company, sensing export market for stainless steel ball valves, expanded the manufacturing facilities by adding additional building and machinery under phase II. In Phase II, the company integrated forward into stainless steel ball valves (1200 tpa) to give value-addition to the castings
